mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bb_rooms_supports ( room_id, support_id, remark, price) VALUES
(#{support.roomId}, #{support.supportId},#{support.remark},#{support.price})
mapper.select: SELECT bb_rooms_supports.id, bb_rooms_supports.support_id as supportId, bb_supports.name as name, CONCAT('https://bb-platform.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/', bb_supports.cover) AS cover, bb_supports.unit as unit, price FROM bb_supports LEFT JOIN bb_rooms_supports ON bb_rooms_supports.support_id = bb_supports.id WHERE bb_rooms_supports.room_id = #{room}
